import { useState } from "react"; function Contents() { const [subtitle, setSubtitle] = useState(""); const [image_name, setImage] = useState(""); const [contents, setcontents] = useState(""); const onSubTitle = (e) => { setSubtitle(e.target.value); }; const onImage = (e) => { setImage(e.target.value); }; const onContents = (e) => { setcontents(e.target.value); }; return ( <>
banner-design.png
); } export default Contents;
